effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Baggage trains loaded with firearms and artillery wind their way north from the foundries of Nuln, a show of support from the Empire.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Trenes de suministros cargados con armas de fuego y artillería recorren el norte desde las fundiciones de Nuln, un gesto de apoyo desde el Imperio.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: A solemn procession of Elven mages arrives at Kislev's gates in the dead of night, sent by the Warden of the White Tower of Hoeth. They stand ready to fight alongside the Defenders of the World once more.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Una solemne procesión de magos elfos llega a las puertas de Kislev en plena noche, enviada por el Guardián de la Torre Blanca de Hoeth. Están listos para luchar junto a los Defensores del Mundo una vez más.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: The armies of Kislev's enemies crumble, burdened by the darkest of magics. Somewhere, deep in the forests, a cackling laugh echoes through the wind...
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Los ejércitos de los enemigos de Kislev se desmoronan, cargados con la más oscura de las magias. En algún lugar, en lo profundo de los bosques, una risa estridente resuena en el viento...

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: A single drop delivered to the eye engorges the creatures of the forest with newfound power. But to drink the substance is another matter entirely...
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Una sola gota entregada al ojo engorda a las criaturas del bosque con un nuevo poder. Pero beber la sustancia es otra cuestión por completo...

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: A single drop delivered to the eye engorges the creatures of the forest with newfound power. But to drink the substance is another matter entirely...
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Una sola gota entregada al ojo engorda a las criaturas del bosque con un nuevo poder. Pero beber la sustancia es otra cuestión por completo...

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: The once meagre colony at Bleak Hold Fortress has swelled into a mighty nation that rivals the Motherland in strength and prosperity, though even the most prideful Kislevite knows to never, ever venture too deeply into the forests.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: La vez humilde colonia en la Fortaleza de Retiro Desolado ha crecido hasta convertirse en una poderosa nación que rivaliza con la Madre Patria en fuerza y prosperidad, aunque incluso el Kislevita más orgulloso sabe que nunca, jamás debe aventurarse demasiado profundamente en los bosques.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Thanks to Mother Ostankya's efforts, the corruption of the Chaos Wastes continues to recede towards the Polar Gate. Though she is still considered an outcast, a grateful Motherland now sends baggage trains loaded with provisions in tacit support of her campaign against the daemons.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Gracias a los esfuerzos de la Madre Ostankya, la corrupción de los Desiertos del Caos continúa retrocediendo hacia la Puerta Polar. Aunque todavía es considerada una marginada, una Madre Patria agradecida ahora envía trenes de bagajes cargados de provisiones en apoyo tácito de su campaña contra los demonios.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: The Ice Queen's ruinous leadership will lead Kislev astray no longer. The Motherland is stronger for it.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: El desastroso liderazgo de la Reina de Hielo ya no llevará a Kislev por mal camino. La Madre Patria es más fuerte por ello.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Where Katarin failed, Kostaltyn succeeded. Recognising the true power of the Great Orthodoxy, several Ice Witches have deserted their queen and joined their strength to Kostaltyn's, wreathing his warriors in frozen armour and battering invaders with ceaseless blizzards. The Supreme Patriarch yearns to have the heathens executed on cleansing pyres, but stays his hand, for now...
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Donde Katarin falló, Kostaltyn tuvo éxito. Reconociendo el verdadero poder de la Gran Ortodoxia, varias Brujas de Hielo han desertado de su reina y han unido su fuerza a la de Kostaltyn, envolviendo a sus guerreros en armaduras heladas y golpeando a los invasores con tormentas de nieve incesantes. El Sumo Patriarca anhela ejecutar a los herejes en hogueras purificadoras, pero detiene su mano, por ahora...

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: You follow a great man, but he is just a man. Follow the bear, and you will know true strength.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Sigues a un gran hombre, pero él es solo un hombre. Sigue al oso y conocerás la verdadera fuerza.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: The followers of Handrich now see that the true path to salvation lies through the renunciation of all wealth, preferably to the Patriarchs of the Great Orthodoxy.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Los seguidores de Handrich ahora ven que el verdadero camino hacia la salvación radica en la renuncia a toda riqueza, preferiblemente a los Patriarcas de la Gran Ortodoxia.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: The wolf and the bear must stand together to brave the coming storm. The Great Orthodoxy will ensure such a union perseveres.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: El lobo y el oso deben estar juntos para enfrentar la tormenta que se avecina. La Gran Ortodoxia asegurará que tal unión persevera.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Rejoice, peasants. The fires of Dazh have exposed your masters for what they truly were. Feed the flames, and your salvation will be ensured.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Alegraos, campesinos. Los fuegos de Dazh han expuesto a vuestros amos por lo que realmente eran. Alimentad las llamas, y vuestra salvación estará asegurada.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: The Geomantic Web thrums with power, the spawning pools thrash with new life - all is as the Old Ones foretold.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: La Red Geomántica vibra con poder, las piscinas de generación bullen con nueva vida, todo es como los Ancestrales predijeron.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Ancient connections long severed are now repaired. Mazdamundi is able to extend his thoughts out across vast distances, and so calls for all Lizardmen everywhere to unite under his Sunburst Standard.\\n\\n
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Conexiones antiguas, una vez rotas, ahora están reparadas. Mazdamundi puede extender sus pensamientos a través de vastas distancias, y por lo tanto llama a todos los Hombres Lagarto en todas partes a unirse bajo su Estandarte de la Ráfaga Solar.\\n\\n

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: The servants of the Ancient Enemy in Naggaroth have been exterminated, bringing the Great Plan one step closer to fruition.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Los siervos del Enemigo Ancestral en Naggaroth han sido exterminados, acercando un paso más el Gran Plan a la realización.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: The interlopers have been purged. The Skink artisans and Kroxigor labourers can continue their work unabated.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Los intrusos han sido purgados. Los artesanos Escurridizos y los trabajadores Kroxigor pueden continuar su trabajo sin obstáculos.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Across Cathay, the leylines surge with renewed energy. Yet all is not as it was. An abberation disrupts the flow of magic, causing countless deviations in the Great Plan. This must be corrected...
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: En todo Catai, las líneas lejanas irradian una energía renovada. Pero no todo es como era. Una aberración interrumpe el flujo de magia, causando incontables desviaciones en el Gran Plan. Esto debe corregirse...

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: The warmbloods have been sent packing back to their decadent civilisation, proven to be no match for the Lizardmen. Least of all, for Nakai the Wanderer!
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Los de sangre cálida han sido enviados de vuelta a su decadente civilización, demostrando no ser rival para los Hombres Lagarto. ¡Menos aún para Nakai el Errabundo!

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Not since the Bridge of Stars has Nakai dealt such a grievous blow to the Ancient Enemy.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: No desde el Puente de las Estrellas Nakai ha infligido un golpe tan grave al Enemigo Anciano.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Though the warmbloods have been driven to the brink of ruin, the man-spawn from across the World Pond now muster for a desperate final assault!
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Aunque los de sangre caliente han sido llevados al borde de la ruina, los engendros humanos de todo el Charco del Mundo ahora se preparan para un desesperado asalto final.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: The Spirits of the Jungle will not rest until Wei-Jin is in flames and the dragons have been ousted from their Celestial Palace. It is the will of the Old Ones.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Los Espíritus de la Jungla no descansarán hasta que Wei-Jin arda en llamas y los dragones hayan sido expulsados de su Palacio Celestial. Es la voluntad de los Ancestrales.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: The Cathayans and the Lizardmen have come to an accord. With the guidance of the Slann Mage Priests, the Wu Xing Compass was safely integrated into the Geomantic Web.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Los Catayanos y los Hombres Lagarto han llegado a un acuerdo. Con la guía de los Sacerdotes Magos Slann, la Brújula Wu Xing se integró de forma segura en la Red Geomántica.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: The southern polar gate now lies dormant, contained by the efforts of many Slann Mage-Priests working in unison. The Ancient Enemy has been struck a blow that they will never recover from. All is as the Old Ones prophesied.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: La puerta polar del sur yace ahora latente, contenida por los esfuerzos de muchos Mago-Sacerdotes Slann trabajando en unión. El Enemigo Ancestral ha sido golpeado con un golpe del que nunca se recuperarán. Todo es como los Ancestrales profetizaron.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: With the Ancient Enemy defeated in the south, Lord Mazdamundi now turns his attention to the temple-city of Pahuax, Oxyotl’s birthplace. The time for its reawakening is at hand...
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Con el Enemigo Ancestral derrotado en el sur, el Señor Mazdamundi ahora dirige su atención a la ciudad-templo de Pahuax, lugar de nacimiento de Oxyotl. El momento de su despertar está cerca...

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: The spawning pools of Pahuax seethe with new life, bringing forth scores of Oxyotl’s kin into the world.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Las piscinas de cría de Pahuax hierven con nueva vida, trayendo a scores de los congéneres de Oxyotl al mundo.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: The northern polar gate now lies dormant, contained by the efforts of many Slann Mage-Priests channelling the resurgent powers of the Geomantic Web. The Ancient Enemy's foremost gateway into the mortal plane is now closed. All is as the sacred plaques foretold.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: La puerta polar del norte ahora yace latente, contenida por los esfuerzos de muchos Mago-Sacerdotes Slann canalizando los poderes resurgentes de la Red Geomántica. La principal puerta de entrada del Enemigo Ancestral al plano mortal está ahora cerrada. Todo es como las tablillas sagradas predijeron.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: A silent terror stalks the wastes, delivering the Old Ones' vengeance in a hail of poisoned darts.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Un terror silencioso acecha los desiertos, entregando la venganza de los Ancestrales en una lluvia de dardos envenenados.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: With but a single breath, Oxyotl brought the Brass Bull crashing to earth. The Slann Mage-Priests are now free to unleash their cleansing magics upon the Heart of the Dark.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Con solo un aliento, Oxyotl derribó al Toro de Bronce. Los Mago-Sacerdotes Slann ahora son libres de desatar sus magias purificadoras sobre el Corazón de la Oscuridad.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Under Oxyotl's vengeful leadership, the Ghosts of Pahuax hunt down and banish the Daemons of Chaos wherever they are found.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Bajo el liderazgo vengativo de Oxyotl, los Fantasmas de Pahuax persiguen y destierran a los Demonios del Caos dondequiera que se encuentren.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: The servants of Chaos find only death in a hail of barbed darts, their machinations thwarted at every turn.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Los siervos del Caos encuentran solo la muerte en una lluvia de dardos barbados, sus maquinaciones frustradas en cada turno.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Though Gotrek was furious with Oxyotl’s intervention, claiming he had been cheated from his glorious doom, Felix thanked the Skink for leading them out of Khorne’s realm and promised to spread the word of his good deed.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Aunque Gotrek estaba furioso con la intervención de Oxyotl, reclamando que había sido engañado de su glorioso destino, Félix agradeció al Skink por llevarlos fuera del reino de Khorne y prometió difundir la palabra de su buena acción.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: With the Council of Thirteen slain and the Shattered Tower of Skavenblight cast down into ruin, the Skaven are in complete disarray. Their fate is in your hands...
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Con el Consejo de los Trece asesinado y la Torre Destruida de PlagaSkaven reducida a ruinas, los skaven están en completo desorden. Su destino está en tus manos...

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: After piecing together the feathered serpent’s prophecy, the Red Crests were guided to an ancient, long-forgotten temple-city that contained dozens of relics from the Dawn of Creation.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Tras reunir la profecía de la serpiente emplumada, las Crestas Rojas fueron guiadas a una antigua y olvidada ciudad templo que contenía docenas de reliquias de los Albores de la Creación.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Not since Man-Dread Ratslayer have the Skaven known such fear. Whether scurrying across the heartlands of Cathay or burrowing through the snow-strewn oblasts of Kislev, none can escape the Prophet of Sotek’s sacrificial blade.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: No desde los tiempos de Hombres-Miedo MataRatas han conocido los skaven tal terror. Ya sea correteando por las tierras centrales de Catai o excavando en las oblasts nevadas de Kislev, ninguno puede escapar a la hoja sacrificial del Profeta de Sotek.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: The altars run red with the blood of countless Skaven, their hearts offered up to Sotek in gory rituals of worship.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Los altares corren rojos con la sangre de innumerables skaven, sus corazones ofrecidos a Sotek en sangrientos rituales de adoración.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: The Snake Pits grow thick with the bodies of countless Skaven, their bones picked clean by ravenous swarms of serpents.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Los Pozos de las Serpientes se llenan con los cuerpos de innumerables skaven, sus huesos limpiados por voraces enjambres de serpientes.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: A supernatural blizzard has descended upon Throgg's kingdom and shows no signs of abating. Under cover of darkness, his subjects lay waste to entire nations, leaving desolate fields of cracked ice and frozen bones in their wake.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Una tormenta de nieve sobrenatural ha descendido sobre el reino de Throgg y no muestra signos de disminuir. Bajo el cobijo de la oscuridad, sus súbditos arrasan naciones enteras, dejando campos desolados de hielo agrietado y huesos congelados a su paso.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: While butchering a Kislevite settlement, the Troll King comes face-to-face with one of the Eagle God's servants: Aekold Helbrass.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Mientras masacra un asentamiento Kislevita, el Rey Troll se encuentra cara a cara con uno de los siervos del Dios Águila: Aekold Helbrass.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Throgg's retinue now boasts the largest assortment of Trolls ever witnessed in living memory. Under their king's wise rule, they have fed well on the flesh of their enemies.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: El séquito de Throgg ahora cuenta con la mayor variedad de Trolls jamás vista en la memoria viva. Bajo el sabio gobierno de su rey, se han alimentado bien de la carne de sus enemigos.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Since consuming the would-be Conqueror of Kislev, Throgg’s regenerative capabilities have blossomed to new heights.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Desde que consumió al aspirante a Conquistador de Kislev, las capacidades regenerativas de Throgg han florecido a nuevas alturas.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: The radiant flesh of Aekold’s corpse brings bountiful life to the bleak lands of Throgg’s kingdom.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: La carne radiante del cadáver de Aekold trae vida abundante a las tierras desoladas del reino de Throgg.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Seafang's figurehead greedily absorbed the blood of the slain challengers smeared upon it. The ship now thrums with an eldritch power that has spread across Wulfrik's entire fleet, filling their sails with the Winds of Magic.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: La figura de proa de Seafang absorbió ávidamente la sangre de los desafiantes muertos embadurnados en ella. El barco ahora vibra con un poder arcano que se ha extendido por toda la flota de Wulfrik, llenando sus velas con los Vientos de la Magia.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Baleful monuments to your dark master poison the land and whip the Winds of Magic up into a hurricane gale, allowing hordes of daemons to manifest directly into the mortal realm.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Los monumentos funestos a tu oscuro amo envenenan la tierra y agitan los Vientos de la Magia en un huracán, permitiendo que hordas de demonios se manifiesten directamente en el reino mortal.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: With his Gift of Tongues, Wulfrik curses foes and goads them into recklessness. Whether he's besmirching a Dwarf's honour, questioning a Bretonnian's lineage or humiliating a haughty Elf - none can ignore his insults for long.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Con su Don de Lenguas, Wulfrik maldice a sus enemigos y los incita a la imprudencia. Ya sea mancillando el honor de un Enano, cuestionando el linaje de un Bretoniano o humillando a un altivo Elfo, ninguno puede ignorar sus insultos durante mucho tiempo.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: We fought monsters, and we became them.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Luchamos contra monstruos, y nos convertimos en ellos.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: The Norscans of Lustria have taught Wulfrik's warriors how to harvest and coat their blades in deadly poisons from the jungles.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Los nórdicos de Lustria han enseñado a los guerreros de Wulfrik cómo recolectar y recubrir sus espadas con venenos mortales de la jungla.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Nurgle’s garden blooms throughout the Chaos Wastes. Epidemius has been forced to enlist the aid of all seven Proctors of Pestilence to catalogue the abundance of new afflictions.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: El jardín de Nurgle florece en todo el Yermo del Caos. Epidemius se ha visto obligado a enlistar la ayuda de los siete Proctores de la Peste para catalogar la abundancia de nuevas aflicciones.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: The Red Plague swept through Norsca, cutting down men as wheat before the scythe. Scores more succumbed to the flesh-sloughing Black Rot, or were driven insane by the Shaking Fever, which infests the brains of its victims with writhing, ravenous maggots. Those that survived pledged themselves to the Maggot King’s cause.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: La Plaga Roja arrasó Norsca, derribando hombres como trigo ante la hoz. Muchos más sucumbieron a la Peste Negra, que despoja la carne, o fueron llevados a la locura por la Fiebre Agitada, que infesta los cerebros de sus víctimas con gusanos retorcidos y voraces. Aquellos que sobrevivieron se juramentaron al bando del Rey de las Moscas.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: By the Plagued Panjandrum’s decree, the carnival was directed to move on to new pastures while the Tallymen assessed their impact. At last, some peace and quiet!
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Por decreto del Panjandrum Apestado, el carnaval fue dirigido a nuevas praderas mientras los Archivistas de Nurgle evaluaban su impacto. ¡Por fin, algo de paz y tranquilidad!

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Nurgle's Chaos Cults rot the the world, weakening the strength of the armies of mortals and the morale of their civilian subjects. A single cough can lay low a legendary hero where feats of arms have failed. A sneeze can decimate an entire town. Where subtle measures fail, cultists can rip apart the veil between reality and the Realm of Chaos, summoning Nurgle's Daemons to lay waste with their contagions. As pestilence grips the world, Nurgle's power eclipses that of his brother gods.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Los Cultos del Caos de Nurgle pudren el mundo, debilitando la fuerza de los ejércitos de los mortales y la moral de sus súbditos civiles. Una sola tos puede derribar a un héroe legendario donde las hazañas de armas han fallado. Un estornudo puede diezmar toda una ciudad. Cuando las medidas sutiles fallan, los cultistas pueden rasgar el velo entre la realidad y el Reino del Caos, invocando a los Demonios de Nurgle para arrasar con sus contagios. A medida que la pestilencia se apodera del mundo, el poder de Nurgle eclipsa el de sus hermanos dioses.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: The aged Necromancer's resilience to toxins rivals those of Poxfulcrum herself. This delights Ku'gath to no end, as he makes an excellent subject for which to test his latest creations.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: La resistencia del anciano Nigromante a los toxinas rivaliza con las de Poxfulcrum misma. Esto deleita a Ku'gath enormemente, ya que lo convierte en un excelente sujeto para probar sus últimas creaciones.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Ku'gath took great delight in visiting the many sights and cities of Grand Cathay, showing his appreciation by sharing the many gifts he had created. Throughout the provinces, crops withered, rice paddies were blighted, and the people took ill. They called him Zin-Fa and prayed to him for salvation. He was only too happy to oblige...
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Ku'gath se deleitó mucho visitando los muchos lugares y ciudades de la Gran Catai, mostrando su aprecio compartiendo los muchos regalos que había creado. Por todas las provincias, los cultivos se marchitaron, los campos de arroz se arruinaron y la gente enfermó. Lo llamaron Zin-Fa y oraron a él por salvación. Él estuvo encantado de complacerlos...

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Ku'gath's newest creation runs rampant through the oblasts. Brave Kossars stumble and fall, their blood crystalising in their veins, their hearts pierced in a hundred different places by the tiny shards. The Ice Witches suffer the most; their corpses nightmares to behold: great shards of ice emerging from gaping mouths and bloody eye sockets.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: La creación más reciente de Ku'gath se desboca por los óblats. Valientes Kossars tropiezan y caen, su sangre cristalizándose en sus venas, sus corazones perforados en cien lugares diferentes por los pequeños fragmentos. Las Brujas de Hielo sufren más; sus cadáveres son pesadillas de contemplar: grandes fragmentos de hielo emergiendo de bocas abiertas y cuencas oculares ensangrentadas.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Ku'gath once spent several centuries within the Forge of Souls as punishment for his failure against the Dwarfs. Yet Nurgle has always been a forgiving father. This recent victory has raised Ku'gath to the pinnacle of the Urfather's favour once more.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Ku'gath pasó varios siglos dentro de la Forja de Almas como castigo por su fracaso contra los Enanos. Sin embargo, Nurgle siempre ha sido un padre indulgente. Esta reciente victoria ha elevado a Ku'gath al pináculo del favor del Padre Urfather una vez más.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Ku'gath, ever generous with his children, gifted them with his newest creation, derived from the pollutants found within the River Ruin. The Nurglings are soon overjoyed to discover their skin hardening like iron from this new gift.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Ku'gath, siempre generoso con sus hijos, los obsequió con su creación más nueva, derivada de los contaminantes encontrados en el Río Ruina. Los Nurgletes pronto descubrieron con alegría que su piel se endurecía como el hierro gracias a este nuevo regalo.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Cathay’s lush heartlands were soon overcome with alien flora and fauna from Nurgle’s garden. Bustling cities and leagues of paddy fields gave way to carnivorous jungles and putrid swamplands: environments that the Toad Dragons flourish in.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Las tierras centrales exuberantes de Catai pronto fueron invadidas por flora y fauna alienígena del jardín de Nurgle. Ciudades bulliciosas y leguas de campos de arroz cedieron paso a junglas carnívoras y pantanos putrefactos: ambientes en los que los Dragones Sapo prosperan.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: The corpulent corpse of Greasus Goldtooth was inferior to Tamurkhan’s current host, though his subjects were quick to take up the Fly Lord’s gifts.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: El cadavérico cuerpo de Greasus Goldtooth fue inferior al actual huésped de Tamurkhan, aunque sus súbditos fueron rápidos en aceptar los regalos del Señor de las Moscas.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Whether through strength of arms or force of will, the masters of the Dark Lands have yielded to the Maggot Lord’s reign.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Ya sea por fuerza de armas o por fuerza de voluntad, los amos de las Tierras Oscuras han cedido al reinado del Señor de los Gusanos.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: From the Throne of Chaos, Tamurkhan rules over a new empire of death and decay. All is as the Urfather wills.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Desde el Trono del Caos, Tamurkhan gobierna sobre un nuevo imperio de muerte y descomposición. Todo es como el Padre Primigenio quiere.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Tamurkhan has ushered forth a new plague from the tainted waters of the Abbey of the Lilies at Nuln.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Tamurkhan ha desatado una nueva plaga desde las aguas contaminadas de la Abadía de los Lirios en Nuln.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Now undisputed in all matters military, Golgfag’s presence commands respect in his allies and unbridled terror in his foes.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Ahora indiscutido en todos los asuntos militares, la presencia de Golgfag impone respeto entre sus aliados y un terror desenfrenado en sus enemigos.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: A hooded figure approaches Golfag’s camp, proffering a scroll of parchment bound with a regal seal...
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Una figura encapuchada se acerca al campamento de Golgfag, ofreciendo un pergamino atado con un sello real...

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Those who enter the Maneaters’ camp witness vast mounds of gold and gems, meat pots overflowing with dozens of different species, and countless barrels of pilfered ale. Few Ogres who join Golgfag’s tribe are ever tempted to leave.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Quienes entran en el campamento de los Comehombres son testigos de vastos montones de oro y gemas, calderos rebosantes de carne de docenas de especies diferentes y un sinfín de barriles de cerveza robada. Pocos Ogros que se unen a la tribu de Golgfag se sienten alguna vez tentados a marcharse.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: The Maneaters have now fought in campaigns on nearly every continent in the known world. Grizzled veterans all, their services are in high demand the world over.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Los Comehombres han luchado en campañas en casi todos los continentes del mundo conocido. Veteranos curtidos todos, sus servicios son muy demandados en todo el mundo.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Greasus' wealth is now so obscene that even the lowliest Gnoblar in his tribe is bedecked in finery that would beggar a noble. All vie to join the Goldtooths and share in their wealth, and even the great nations of the world are enticed by the Hoardmaster's lucrative offers.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: La riqueza de Grasientus ahora es tan obscena que incluso el más humilde Gnoblar de su tribu está adornado con atuendos que arruinarían a un noble. Todos compiten por unirse a los Goldtooths y compartir su riqueza, e incluso las grandes naciones del mundo se sienten atraídas por las lucrativas ofertas del Maestro del Botín.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: The Goldtooth Tribe now boasts an impressive assortment of hell-forged arms and armour from the Dark Lands.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: La Tribu Dientedoro ahora cuenta con un impresionante surtido de armas y armaduras forjadas en el infierno provenientes de las Tierras Oscuras.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: The Cathayans have now accepted their place at the Overtyrant's feet. Caravans journey to his Great Hall laden with gold, gemstones and exotic meats, hoping to barter for safe passage across the Ivory Road. Each season, their profit margins grow smaller.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Los catayanos ahora han aceptado su lugar a los pies de Grasientus. Caravanas viajan a su Gran Salón cargadas de oro, piedras preciosas y carnes exóticas, con la esperanza de negociar un paso seguro por la Ruta de Marfil. Cada temporada, sus márgenes de beneficio disminuyen.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: After climbing to the highest spire of the Forbidden Citadel, Skrag stared into the heart of the Maelstrom. He beheld the almighty Sea Maw, and it was then that revelation struck. The Great Maw was one god of two aspects, a mighty beast who would one day gorge on the whole world!
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Tras ascender a la cima del más alto pináculo de la Ciudadela Prohibida, Skrag miró al corazón del Maelstrom. Contempló las poderosas Fauces Marinas, y fue entonces cuando la revelación le golpeó. Las Grandes Fauces eran un dios de dos aspectos, una bestia imponente que algún día devoraría el mundo entero.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: After glutting themselves on the Empire’s bounteous population, Skrag’s Butchers have become experts of Gastromancy.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Después de saciarse con la abundante población del Imperio, los Carniceros de Skrag se han convertido en expertos en Gastromancia.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Skrag’s Gore-Gnoblars are the most bloodthirsty examples of their kind. They roam across the Empire in packs, exsanguinating their victims and dousing themselves in their blood.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Los Gore-Gnoblars de Skrag son los ejemplos más sanguinarios de su tipo. Vagabundean por el Imperio en manadas, desangrando a sus víctimas y empapándose en su sangre.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Unholy noises echoed up from beneath the earth as the Gorgers tore through the insectoid hive. Their feast wrought great change upon their already heavily mutated bodies, and they emerged back into the sunlight more powerful than ever.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Ruidos profanos resonaban desde debajo de la tierra mientras las Gargantúas desgarraban la colmena insectoide. Su festín produjo un gran cambio en sus cuerpos ya gravemente mutados, y emergieron de nuevo a la luz del sol más poderosos que nunca.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: The Disciples of the Maw journey to Galleon’s Graveyard. The Sea Maw lies at the heart of the Maelstrom, but first Count Noctilus and his horde of rotten meat must be dealt with!
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Los Discípulos de las Fauces viajan al Cementerio de los Galeones. La Gran Fauce se encuentra en el corazón del Vórtice, ¡pero primero hay que enfrentarse al Conde Noctilus y su horda de carne podrida!

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Finally, Snikch has located the mysterious power! Should he decide to keep it for himself, not even his master – nor any of the Lords or Decay for that matter – will be able to challenge him!
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: ¡Finalmente, Snikch ha localizado el misterioso poder! Si decide guardarlo para sí mismo, ni siquiera su maestro -ni ninguno de los Señores de la Decadencia, por cierto- podrá desafiarlo.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Demand for Clan Eshin's services are at an all-time high after their recent successes within Cathay. Though some complain of their exorbitant prices, none can deny the results.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: La demanda de los servicios del Clan Eshin está en su punto más alto después de sus recientes éxitos dentro de Catai. Aunque algunos se quejan de sus precios exorbitantes, nadie puede negar los resultados.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Barren, warpstone-strewn plains are all that remain of Cathay's bountiful paddy fields and verdant forests. The Skaven now rule these lands, consuming or enslaving any foolish enough to still venture here.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Páramos estériles, plagados de piedra bruja, son todo lo que queda de los fértiles campos de arroz y bosques verdes de Catai. Los Skaven ahora gobiernan estas tierras, consumiendo o esclavizando a cualquiera lo suficientemente insensato como para aventurarse aquí todavía.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Now saturated with the tempestuous energies of the Great Vortex, the Machine of Doom and Curses is ready to transform Ulthuan into a nightmare hellscape of death and devastation, a Realm of Ruin that awaits its horned ruler…
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Ahora saturada con las energías tempestuosas del Gran Vórtice, el Dispositivo de Perdición y Maldiciones está listo para transformar Ulthuan en un infierno de muerte y devastación, un Reino de la Ruina que espera a su gobernante cornudo…

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Clan Skryre’s shipyards, manufacturing plants and foundries now dominate the shores of Ulthuan. Their conquest of the fabled isle has solidified their pre-eminent position within Skavendom.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Los astilleros, plantas de manufactura y fundiciones del Clan Skryre ahora dominan las costas de Ulthuan. Su conquista de la legendaria isla ha solidificado su posición preeminente dentro del dominio skaven.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Despite the Bretonnian’s magical defences, Clan Skryre have tracked him to the Abbey of La Maisontaal. The Black Arc will soon be returned to Skaven paws!
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: A pesar de las defensas mágicas del bretoniano, el Clan Skryre lo ha rastreado hasta la Abadía de La Maisontaal. ¡El Arca Negra pronto volverá a las zarpas skaven!

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: After reducing dozens of Bretonnian castles to smouldering rubble, the Chief Warlock has fine-tuned the destructive potential of his Warp Lightning Cannons.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Tras reducir a escombros humeantes docenas de castillos bretonianos, el Jefe Brujo ha perfeccionado el potencial destructivo de sus Cañones de Rayo de Disformidad.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: The verdant woodland realm is now a warpstone-tainted wasteland stripped bare by the ravenous vermintide from Skavenblight. Clan Skryre are slowly harvesting the forest to construct their war machines and fuel their warpforges.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: El verdeante reino forestal es ahora un páramo contaminado por piedra bruja, despojado por la voraz plaga de ratas de PlagaSkaven. El Clan Skryre está cosechando lentamente el bosque para construir sus máquinas de guerra y alimentar sus forjas de disformidad.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Following in his predecessor's footsteps, Archaon the Everchosen leads a great host into Hell Pit, hoping to stall Clan Moulder's relentless attacks across Norsca. Yet the Castellan stands ready to repel the invaders, and he means to claim his vengeance in blood.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Siguiendo los pasos de su predecesor, Archaón el Elegido Eterno conduce una gran hueste hacia el Pozo Infernal, esperando detener los ataques implacables del Clan Moulder en Norsca. Sin embargo, el Castellano está listo para repeler a los invasores, y pretende reclamar su venganza en sangre.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Winding lines of meat wagons journey towards Hell Pit, ensuring the ravenous appetites of Throt's monstrous creations are always sated.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Líneas sinuosas de carros de carne viajan hacia el Pozo Infernal, asegurando que los apetitos voraces de las monstruosas creaciones de Throt siempre estén saciados.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Like a squished moth, Ariel is now nothing but a pulp consumed by Throt to abate his hunger, with the remains used to augment his twisted hench-rats!
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Como una polilla aplastada, Ariel ahora no es más que una pulpa consumida por Throt para calmar su hambre, ¡con los restos usados para aumentar a sus retorcidas ratas secuaces!

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: The Mage-Queen's pulped remains have been bottled into hundreds of vials, each one worth a small fortune in warpstone. Envoys from every clan in Skavendom journey to Hell Pit in the hopes of acquiring the precious substance.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Los restos triturados de la Reina-Maga han sido embotellados en cientos de frascos, cada uno de ellos valioso fortuna en piedra bruja. Enviados de cada clan de Skavendom viajan hacia el Pozo Infernal con la esperanza de adquirir la preciosa sustancia.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: With the Everchosen's host smashed to a bloody pulp, none can stop Clan Moulder's merciless harvest of the Norscan population.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Con la hueste del Elegido Eterno destrozada hasta convertirse en una pulpa ensangrentada, ninguno puede detener la cosecha despiadada del Clan Moulder de la población nórdica.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Ghoritch's victory over the Everchosen has only deepened his lust for slaughter and carnage. A day spent without spilling blood and crushing bone for Khorne is a day wasted.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: La victoria de Ghoritch sobre el Elegido del Caos solo ha intensificado su sed de matanza y carnicería. Un día sin derramar sangre y triturar huesos en nombre de Khorne es un día perdido.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: With the Mage-Queen's demise, Throt prepares to harvest her divine flesh...
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Con la muerte de la Reina-Maga, Throt se prepara para cosechar su carne divina...

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: The Headtaker's trophy rack groans with a litany of voices, some enraged at their imprisonment, others humiliated at their defeat, but all subservient to mighty Queek!
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: La estantería de trofeos del Coleccionista de Cabezas gime con una letanía de voces, algunas enfurecidas por su encarcelamiento, otras humilladas por su derrota, pero todas subyugadas al poderoso Queek!

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: All fear the crimson terror of the Southlands. Whether fleeing across windswept dunes or hiding in sweltering jungles - he will find you.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Todos temen el terror carmesí de las Tierras del Sur. Ya sea huyendo a través de dunas barridas por el viento o escondiéndose en junglas sofocantes, él te encontrará.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Queek journeys to Skavenblight to present the Withering Idol to his master. When he arrives, the War-King of Clan Mors reveals to his favoured subordinate his true intentions for the device…
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Queek viaja a PlagaSkaven para presentar el Ídolo Marchito a su amo. Cuando llega, el Rey de Guerra del Clan Mors revela a su subordinado favorito sus verdaderas intenciones para el dispositivo...

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: “The City of Pillars is ours, from deepest deep to loftiest peak! Queek brings you this greatest of victories, only Queek!”
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: "¡La Ciudad de los Pilares es nuestra, desde lo más profundo a lo más alto! ¡Queek os trae esta mayor de las victorias, solo Queek!"

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: After a great battle in the depths of Skavenblight, Queek emerged triumphant over his old master. He cares not for Gnawdwell’s machinations. He longs only for battle!
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Después de una gran batalla en las profundidades de PlagaSkaven, Queek emergió triunfante sobre su antiguo amo. No le importan las maquinaciones de Gnawdwell. ¡Anhela solo la batalla!

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Warlord Gnawdwell successfully unleashed the Withering Idol upon his adversaries. None survived. Clan Mors has emerged triumphant, and Queek has proven himself as a trusted right paw to his master.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: El Señor de Guerra Gnawdwell liberó con éxito el Ídolo Marchito sobre sus adversarios. Ninguno sobrevivió. El Clan Mors ha emergido triunfante, y Queek se ha demostrado como una pata derecha de confianza para su amo.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: The many forges of the Chaos Dwarfs now serve Clan Rictus, outfitting scores of Stormvermin with warpforged arms and armour.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Las numerosas forjas de los Enanos del Caos ahora sirven a Clan Rictus, equipando a decenas de Alimañas con armas y armaduras forjadas en la disformidad.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Standing atop the highest towers of the Dark Lands, the Grey Seers conduct their fell rituals to guide Warpstone Meteors towards the base of Crookback Mountain, where they can be harvested safely.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Parados en lo alto de las torres más altas de las Tierras Oscuras, los Videntes Grises llevan a cabo sus rituales nefastos para guiar a los Meteoritos de Piedra Bruja hacia la base de la Montaña Jorobada, donde pueden ser cosechados de manera segura.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Skreet Blackblade, right-claw to the Supreme Warlord of Clan Rictus, has made the long journey to the Everpeak to “congratulate” Tretch in person for his momentous victory. Tretch is no fool. He has already made the necessary preparations…
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Skreet Cuchilla Negra, garra derecha del Supremo Señor de la Guerra del Clan Rictus, ha realizado el largo viaje a la Cima Eterna para "felicitar" a Tretch en persona por su victoria trascendental. Tretch no es tonto. Ya ha hecho los preparativos necesarios...

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Clan Mors is no more, their greatest warriors subjugated or slain. With this great victory, Clan Rictus has risen to prominence as a Great Clan, rivalling the ancient clans of Skyre, Pestilens, Eshin and Moulder in military and political influence.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: El Clan Mors ya no existe, sus más grandes guerreros están subyugados o muertos. Con esta gran victoria, el Clan Rictus ha ascendido a la prominencia como un Gran Clan, rivalizando con los antiguos clanes de Skyre, Pestilens, Eshin y Moulder en influencia militar y política.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Tretch uses Fozzrik's magic to amass a vast collection of arcane treasures, summoning the contents of hidden vaults or entire baggage trains to the Flying Fortress.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Tretch usa la magia de Fozzrik para acumular una vasta colección de tesoros arcanos, convocando el contenido de bóvedas ocultas o trenes de bagaje enteros a la Fortaleza Voladora.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: After scouring half the continent, Clan Pestilens has finally uncovered the Wormstone’s location. Actually acquiring the artefact, however, will be no straightforward matter...
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Después de rastrear la mitad del continente, el Clan Pestilens finalmente ha descubierto la ubicación de la Piedra Gusano. Sin embargo, adquirir el artefacto no será tarea sencilla...

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: The Elves of Naggaroth were the first victims of Lord Skrolk's newfound plague. Such was the torment inflicted upon them that when the end finally came - they welcomed it.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Los Elfos de Naggaroth fueron las primeras víctimas de la nueva plaga del Señor Skrolk. Tal fue el tormento infligido sobre ellos que, cuando finalmente llegó el fin, lo recibieron con alivio.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: After submerging himself in the murky depths of his newly forged cauldron, Lord Skrolk's ravaged body has swollen with newfound pestilential strength.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Después de sumergirse en las profundidades turbias de su recién forjado caldero, el cuerpo devastado del Señor Skrolk se ha hinchado con nueva y pestilente fuerza.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Most who touch the Wormstone die screaming as glow maggots consume them from within, but a precious few survive the experience. Their flesh, now buoyed with writhing new life, can heal from all but the most grievous of blows.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: La mayoría de los que tocan la Piedra Gusano mueren gritando mientras los gusanos brillantes los devoran desde dentro, pero unos pocos afortunados sobreviven a la experiencia. Su carne, ahora llena de una nueva y retorcida vida, puede sanar de todas menos las heridas más graves.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: The Pestilent Brotherhood now wield bile-smeared blades of unfathomable potency. A single scratch is often all that it takes to induce bone-breaking death spasms in the foe.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: La Hermandad Pestilente ahora empuña hojas manchadas de bilis de insondable potencia. A menudo, basta con un solo rasguño para inducir espasmos mortales que rompen los huesos del enemigo.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Snikch's Weeping Blades seem to have a mind of their own, now possessed by the Drinker of Worlds. The Deathmaster's prized weapons will forever afflict him with Tz'arkan's daemonic torment!
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Las Cuchillas Lloronas de Snikch parecen tener una mente propia, ahora poseídas por el Bebedor de Mundos. ¡Las armas preciadas del Maestro de la Muerte siempre le afligirán con el tormento demoníaco de Tz'arkan!

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: The Grey Seers have learned much from their studies of the Drinker of Worlds.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Los Videntes Grises han aprendido mucho de sus estudios sobre el Bebedor de Mundos.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: After his conquest of the Worlds Edge Mountains, Tretch seized control of Clan Rictus and slew Kratch Doomclaw in a fair and honourable duel. Well, that's how Tretch tells it anyway...
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Tras su conquista de las Montañas del Fin del Mundo, Tretch tomó el control del Clan Rictus y mató a Kratch Garra de la Perdición en un duelo justo y honorable. Bueno, al menos así lo cuenta Tretch...

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Let that fool Doomclaw continue to serve Clan Rictus' interests on the Council of Thirteen. All know that mighty Tretch is the true power behind Clan Rictus.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Deja que ese tonto de Garra de la Perdición continúe sirviendo los intereses del Clan Rictus en el Consejo de los Trece. Todos saben que el poderoso Tretch es el verdadero poder detrás del Clan Rictus.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: The Dark Prince's power waxes so strongly that it can no longer be contained within the Realms of Chaos. Storms howl outwards from the polar gates, driving his servants onwards to commit countless unspeakable acts in his name.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: El poder del Príncipe Oscuro crece tan fuertemente que ya no puede ser contenido dentro de los Reinos del Caos. Las tormentas aúllan hacia afuera desde las puertas polares, impulsando a sus servidores a cometer innumerables actos inenarrables en su nombre.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: And all the men and women merely playthings for the Daemonettes.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Y todos los hombres y mujeres no son más que juguetes para las Diablillas.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: The Dark Prince's power waxes so strongly that it can no longer be contained within the Realms of Chaos. Storms howl outwards from the polar gates, driving his servants onwards to commit countless unspeakable acts in his name.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: El poder del Príncipe Oscuro crece tan fuertemente que ya no puede ser contenido dentro de los Reinos del Caos. Las tormentas aúllan hacia afuera desde las puertas polares, impulsando a sus servidores a cometer innumerables actos inenarrables en su nombre.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Let the arrogant fools indulge themselves in fine liquors, exotic sweetmeats and the pleasures of the flesh. Then they shall feast again, and indulge in pleasures of a different sort...
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Dejen que los tontos arrogantes se entreguen a sí mismos en finos licores, golosinas exóticas y los placeres de la carne. Entonces se volverán a banquetear, y se entregarán a placeres de otro tipo...

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Aenarion's final humiliation is at hand. Vengeance never tasted so sweet...
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: La humillación final de Aenarion está cerca. La venganza nunca probó tan dulce...

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Skarbrand's anguished soul now writhes within the Witstealer, granting the blade unparalleled strength.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: El alma angustiada de Skarbrand ahora se retuerce dentro del Ladrón de Mentes, otorgando a la espada una fuerza sin parangón.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Open your hearts to the Flesh-Tempter! No, literally...
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: ¡Abran sus corazones al Tentador de Carne! No, literalmente...

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Arkhan journeys across the dunes, enslaving Tomb Kings from every dynasty and binding their legions to his will. Those who resist are destroyed utterly - their powdered bones lost to the sands of time forevermore.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Arkhan viaja a través de las dunas, esclavizando a los Reyes Funerarios de cada dinastía y atando sus legiones a su voluntad. Aquellos que resisten son destruidos por completo, sus huesos pulverizados perdidos para siempre en las arenas del tiempo.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: These bloodthirsty creatures will make fine foot soldiers in the wars to come. Let their blight curse the lands.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Estas criaturas sedientas de sangre serán excelentes soldados de a pie en las guerras por venir. Dejen que su maldición asole las tierras.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Foremost of the Dark Lords, Arkhan heralds in a new age of death and despair.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Principal de los Señores Oscuros, Arkhan anuncia una nueva era de muerte y desesperación.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: As the Changeling lounged upon his master's throne, divine power surged through his veins. Though the other Dark Gods would obliterate their servants for such an audacious act, Tzeentch merely laughed.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Mientras el Cambiapieles descansaba en el trono de su amo, el poder divino fluía por sus venas. Aunque los otros Dioses Oscuros aniquilarían a sus siervos por un acto tan audaz, Tzeentch simplemente se rió.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Whether writing taunts in the Dammaz Kron or directing Settra's dutiful legions to go swimming in the Great Mortis River, the Changeling's influence is omnipresent. From Wei-Jin to Ulthuan, none can escape his antics!
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Ya sea escribiendo burlas en el Dammaz Kron o dirigiendo las legiones diligentes de Settra a nadar en el Gran Río Mortis, la influencia del Cambiapieles es omnipresente. Desde Wei-Jin hasta Ulthuan, ¡nadie puede escapar de sus travesuras!

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: As her children lay dead or dying, the Moon Empress moved to intercede. Divine intervention could not avail them, however, and only served to betray her whereabouts. The shapeshifters fought for days, flitting between a thousand different forms. Inevitably, the Changeling was repelled, though not before stealing from her that which was most precious...
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Mientras sus hijos yacen muertos o moribundos, la Emperatriz Lunar se movió para interceder. Sin embargo, la intervención divina no pudo ayudarles y solo sirvió para traicionar su paradero. Los cambiapieles lucharon durante días, cambiando entre mil formas diferentes. Inevitablemente, el Maldito fue repelido, aunque no antes de robarle aquello que era más preciado para ella...

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Was this Tzeentch's ultimate goal, or merely one further step towards another end? To even begin to unravel his intentions is to invite madness, for perhaps he is mad himself, and his plans are, in fact, utterly devoid of all reason.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: ¿Fue este el objetivo final de Tzeentch, o simplemente un paso más hacia otro fin? Empezar a desentrañar sus intenciones es invitar a la locura, pues quizás él mismo está loco, y sus planes, de hecho, carecen totalmente de razón.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: The Plaguefather now languishes within the Forge of Souls, his soul the plaything of the daemonsmiths. Without his meddlesome interference, Nurgle's festering gardens swifly decay down to nothing, supplanted by crystalline structures which burst forth from the parched earth.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: El Padre de la Plaga languidece ahora dentro de la Forja de Almas, su alma juguete de los Brujos-Profetas. Sin su molesta interferencia, los jardines putrefactos de Nurgle se descomponen rápidamente hasta desaparecer, suplantados por estructuras cristalinas que brotan de la tierra reseca.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Though most of the artefacts have been sent to the Impossible Fortress for his master's inscrutable designs, others have been kept for the Fateweaver's use in personal combat.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Aunque la mayoría de los artefactos han sido enviados a la Fortaleza Imposible para los inscrutables diseños de su maestro, otros han sido guardados para el uso del Tejedestinos en combate personal.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Though the Lizardmen of the present era had little understanding of these ancient relics, Kairos had long studied their purpose within the Impossible Fortress. His mastery of their magics rivals even those of a first generation Slann.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Aunque los Hombres Lagarto de la era actual tenían poco entendimiento de estos antiguos artefactos, Kairos había estudiado durante mucho tiempo su propósito dentro de la Fortaleza Imposible. Su dominio de sus magias rivaliza incluso con los de un Slann de primera generación.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Fate has been rewritten. Those who were once destined to defeat Kairos now lie dead beneath his claws, their arcane baubles serving only for his entertainment. All is as was foreseen...
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: El destino ha sido reescrito. Aquellos que una vez estuvieron destinados a derrotar a Kairos ahora yacen muertos bajo sus garras, sus adornos arcanos sirviendo solo para su entretenimiento. Todo es como fue previsto...

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Tzeentch's forces now control the Wu Xing Compass. This powerful artefact was once used to protect the people of Cathay. Now, it is utilised as a weapon of war, unleashing fearsome magics upon those it once safeguarded.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Las fuerzas de Tzeentch ahora controlan la Brújula Wu Xing. Este poderoso artefacto solía proteger a la gente de Catai. Ahora, se utiliza como arma de guerra, desatando magias temibles sobre aquellos que una vez protegió.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: With the ichor of the Plaguefather, the bones of the dragon Minaithnir, and the blood of the Grand Theogonist, Helman enacts his grand ritual atop the highest steeple of Nagashizzar.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Con el icor del Padre de la Plaga, los huesos del dragón Minaithnir y la sangre del Gran Teogonista, Helman lleva a cabo su gran ritual en la torre más alta de Nagashizzar.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Helman's horde of walking corpses is beyond counting, swollen to unstoppable proportions by the massacre of Cathay's inhabitants.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: La horda de muertos vivientes de Helman es incalculable, hinchada a proporciones imparables por la masacre de los habitantes de Catai.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Blood and bone simmers within the Darkforged Vessel. The preparations are complete. Helman begins intoning words of dread power from the Liber Noctis...
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Sangre y hueso hierve dentro del Vaso Forjado Oscuro. Los preparativos están completos. Helman comienza a entonar palabras de poder temeroso del Liber Noctis...

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Though his brothers have passed on to Morr's Garden, the price for their safe passage was steep. Helman's soul is now forfeit to Malal, and his body is now under daemonic possession. Eyes glowing with balefire, Helman now serves the Renegade God.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Aunque sus hermanos han pasado al Jardín de Morr, el precio por su paso seguro fue elevado. El alma de Helman ahora está perdida para Malal, y su cuerpo está bajo posesión demoníaca. Con los ojos brillando con fuego fatuo, Helman ahora sirve al Dios Renegado.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Enraged at the daemon's lies, Helman has captured the entity and taken its powers for his own. Using this newfound strength, he has bound his brothers' spirits to their ravaged bodies, but still, something is wrong. They beg for death. Surely, they would be grateful. Determined as ever, Helman continues his hopeless quest.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Enfurecido por las mentiras del demonio, Helman ha capturado la entidad y ha tomado sus poderes para sí mismo. Usando esta fuerza recién descubierta, ha atado los espíritus de sus hermanos a sus cuerpos desgarrados, pero aún así, algo está mal. Ruegan por la muerte. Seguramente, estarían agradecidos. Determinado como siempre, Helman continúa su búsqueda sin esperanza.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: A thick fog blankets all of Bretonnia. Crops wither and die, entire hamlets are found empty and desolate. Tortured groans and unholy bestial roars echo through the still air. The Dark Gods are pleased.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Una densa niebla cubre toda Bretonia. Los cultivos se marchitan y mueren, aldeas enteras se encuentran vacías y desoladas. Gemidos torturados y rugidos bestiales impíos resuenan en el aire quieto. Los Dioses Oscuros están complacidos.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: With the Black Arc now in his possession, the Lichemaster can use the cursed warpstone to enhance his already dangerously powerful necromantic abilities.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Con el Arca Negra ahora en su posesión, el Maestro de la Liche puede usar la maldita piedra bruja para potenciar sus ya peligrosas habilidades necrománticas.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Kemmler believes Krell is an obedient thrall who serves his own interests, but perhaps these recent victories are but one small part of a much grander scheme...
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Kemmler cree que Krell es un siervo obediente que sirve a sus propios intereses, pero quizás estas recientes victorias son solo una pequeña parte de un plan mucho más grande...

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Built from the fused remains of a dozen conquered Tomb Kings, this monolith throbs with unholy power.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Construido a partir de los restos fusionados de una docena de Reyes Funerarios conquistados, este monolito late con un poder profano.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: A portal to Sylvania will become available to Mannfred's army.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Un portal a Sylvania estará disponible para el ejército de Mannfred.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: “This land is my home, my birthright. The wind and rain are my allies. The trees and stones are my foot soldiers. The very earth will rise up against you should you try to take it from me. And my people will feast on your bones.”
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: "Esta tierra es mi hogar, mi derecho de nacimiento. El viento y la lluvia son mis aliados. Los árboles y las piedras son mis soldados de a pie. La misma tierra se alzará contra ustedes si intentan quitármela. Y mi pueblo se alimentará de vuestros huesos".

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: “Nagash was a fool, too weak to see his dreams realised. I will build an empire of death atop his broken legacy.”
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: "Nagash fue un tonto, demasiado débil para ver realizados sus sueños. Construiré un imperio de muerte sobre su legado roto".

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: From the shores of the Great Ocean to the slopes of the Worlds Edge Mountains, all pay the blood tithe and live only to serve the von Carsteins.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Desde las costas del Gran Océano hasta las laderas de las Montañas del Borde del Mundo, todos pagan el tributo de sangre y viven solo para servir a los von Carsteins.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: From the shores of the Great Ocean to the slopes of the Worlds Edge Mountains, all pay the blood tithe and live only to serve the von Carsteins.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Desde las costas del Gran Océano hasta las laderas de las Montañas del Fin del Mundo, todos pagan el tributo de sangre y viven solo para servir a los von Carsteins.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: “They have breached the Great Hall and plundered the lower vaults. We have fought our way to the airfields and hold them for now, but every brave dawi that falls to the horde rises again and raises his axe against us. Curse the Uzkuli and their foul sorcery! Though hope flickers in the stoutest of hearts, I have rallied my warriors for one final charge. By Grimnir, I will cut off the head of that Zangunaz, or die in the attempt!”\\n\\n - The Dammaz Kron, final entry
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: "Han violado la Gran Sala y saqueado las bóvedas inferiores. Nos hemos abierto paso hasta los campos de aviación y los mantenemos por ahora, pero cada valiente dawi que cae ante la horda se levanta de nuevo y levanta su hacha contra nosotros. ¡Maldigo a los Uzkuli y su hechicería vil! Aunque la esperanza titubea en los corazones más valientes, he reunido a mis guerreros para un último asalto. ¡Por Grimnir, cortaré la cabeza de ese Zangunaz, o moriré en el intento!" - El Dammaz Kron, entrada final

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: In the frozen heart of Kislev, pale maidens drink chilled blood while they conduct matters of state. All serve the will of the von Carsteins, save the Ice Queen herself. Within Castle Drakenhof, her mutilated corpse is on display, preserved in a block of ice. In times of melancholy, Isabella need only look upon her grotesque trophy and her spirits are swiftly lifted.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: En el corazón congelado de Kislev, doncellas pálidas beben sangre fría mientras llevan a cabo asuntos de estado. Todos sirven a la voluntad de los von Carsteins, salvo la Reina de Hielo misma. Dentro del Castillo Drakenhof, su cadáver mutilado está en exhibición, conservado en un bloque de hielo. En tiempos de melancolía, Isabella solo necesita mirar su grotesco trofeo y sus ánimos se elevan rápidamente.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Vlad's Necromancers work tirelessly to dismantle the many protective wards safeguarding the ancient dwarfen warriors, so they can be raised to fight once more.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Los nigromantes de Vlad trabajan incansablemente para desmantelar las muchas guardias protectoras que protegen a los antiguos guerreros enanos, para que puedan ser levantados para luchar una vez más.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Long winding columns of baggage trains wend their way from the Everpeak to Castle Drakenhof, gradually emptying the mountain of its vast stores of gold and runic armaments.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Largas columnas serpenteantes de trenes de equipaje se abren paso desde el Pico Eterno hasta el Castillo Drakenhof, vaciando gradualmente la montaña de sus vastas reservas de oro y armamentos rúnicos.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: The portal to the Dreaming Wood is sealed, and the Daemons denied passage into this world. Now cleansed of all malice, the forest of Naggaroth can be bound to Athel Loren. The Weave of life and death grows ever stronger!
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: El portal al Bosque del Ensueño está sellado, y se niega el paso a los Demonios a este mundo. Ahora purificada de toda malicia, el bosque de Naggaroth puede ser atado a Athel Loren. ¡La Tejedura de la vida y la muerte crece cada vez más fuerte!

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: The Mage Queen stayed her hand in ages past. Her Heralds did not make the same mistake. Morathi is dead. Her Dark Covent unmade. Her Tower of Prophecy torn down to its foundations. Let the world be free of her scheming at last.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: La Reina-Maga contuvo su mano en eras pasadas. Sus Heraldos no cometieron el mismo error. Morathi está muerta. Su Covada Oscura deshecha. Su Torre de la Profecía derribada hasta sus cimientos. ¡Que el mundo esté libre de sus intrigas por fin!

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: With the Hammer of Vaul and Caledor's volcanic furnaces at his disposal, Lord Daith's creations now rival those of the God of Smiths himself.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Con el Martillo de Vaul y los hornos volcánicos de Caledor a su disposición, las creaciones del Señor Daith ahora rivalizan con las del mismísimo Dios de los Forjadores.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Whether venturing through the Old World or the New, all men should know to fear the forests.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Ya sea aventurándose por el Viejo Mundo o el Nuevo, todos los hombres deberían saber temer a los bosques.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Within the Everqueen's Grove, Alarielle reigns upon her Oaken Throne. With the passing of the seasons her body withers and the roots pierce deeper into her flesh, but Athel Avelorn thrives. Such is Isha's will.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Dentro del Roble de la Reina Eterna, Alarielle reina sobre su Trono de Roble. Con el paso de las estaciones su cuerpo se marchita y las raíces penetran más profundamente en su carne, pero Athel Avelorn prospera. Tal es la voluntad de Isha.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: The Wood Elves have reaffirmed their isolationist stance. The Forests of the Fey and their surrounding Heathlands are their only concern.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Los Elfos Silvanos han reafirmado su postura aislacionista. Los Bosques de las Hadas y sus Tierras Circundantes son su única preocupación.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: The Wood Elves have embraced an expansionist stance. They range out far beyond the forests’ edge, slaughtering any who would threaten the sanctity of the Everwood.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Los Elfos Silvanos han adoptado una postura expansionista. Se aventuran mucho más allá del borde de los bosques, masacrando a cualquiera que amenace la santidad del Bosque Eterno.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Even the faith of mighty Volkmar was sorely tested as he was taken up and chained to the battle standard of Malagor's warherd.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Incluso la fe del poderoso Volkmar fue duramente puesta a prueba cuando fue alzado y encadenado al estandarte de batalla de la manada de guerra de Malagor.

effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_original: Tidal waves from Amanar's recent attack have wreaked havoc upon this province.
effect_bundles_localised_description_vco.value_translated: Las olas gigantes del reciente ataque de Amanar han causado estragos en esta provincia.

event_feed_strings_text_vco_amanar_summo.value_original: Answering the summons of its new masters, the ancient Merwyrm, Amanar, has emerged from the depths of the ocean and laid waste to this region. Those who survived the initial maelstrom of destruction could only watch in horror as the deathless beast sank back beneath the waves, dragging the rest of the settlement down with it!
event_feed_strings_text_vco_amanar_summo.value_translated: Respondiendo a la llamada de sus nuevos amos, el antiguo Merwyrm, Amanar, ha emergido de las profundidades del océano y ha arrasado esta región. Aquellos que sobrevivieron al torbellino inicial de destrucción solo pudieron mirar con horror cómo la bestia inmortal se hundía nuevamente bajo las olas, llevándose el resto del asentamiento con ella.

incidents_localised_description_vco_inci.value_original: As the Crooked Moon tribe picked through the smoking ruins of a Cathayan caravan, they were set upon by a host of Chaos Dwarfs. Though Skarsnik led his tribe to victory, their losses were great. When the dust settled, Gorduz Backstabber was nowhere to be seen...
incidents_localised_description_vco_inci.value_translated: Mientras la tribu de la Luna Torcida registraba las ruinas humeantes de una caravana Catayana, fueron atacados por una multitud de Enanos del Caos. Aunque Skarsnik condujo a su tribu a la victoria, las pérdidas fueron grandes. Cuando se asentó el polvo, Gorduz el Traicionero había desaparecido...
